transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji good afternoon Prashant ji bol rahe hain?
Executive: Haan ji bolo.
Executive: Prashant ji Saloni baat kar rahe hain IndiaMART se relationship manager. Aapse discuss kiya tha Rishabh ji ne aap ye jo star ki services use ke regarding.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na to aapko usme kuch issue aa raha tha kya leads ke regarding aapki Gayatri Stone impact mein?
Customer: Mam aa to rahi hai. Matlab kehna mein dekho ab to lag ke leads bhi consume kar raha hu sab kuch kar raha hu jab badi lead aati hai na kholne se pehle lapse ho jati hai theek hai aur agar apan choti choti leadon se baat karte bhi hai to aapko pata hai apan as a manufacturer unse business kar hi nahi sakte itna chota supply de hi nahi sakte matlab main to dono jagah se loop hole mein ukhad gaya main karu to karu kya.
Executive: Main aapko dekho abhi jo aap bata rahe hain na ki aap regular basis pe usse check bhi kar rahe ho aap hai na ye aap hi dekhte ho na apne level pe ya koi staff bhi hai aapka jo ye handle kar raha hai.
Customer: Main hi dekhta hu abhi to.
Executive: Achcha aap hi dekhte ho theek hai. To abhi aapko kya system pe main kuch cheeze aapko dikhana chahti hu to usi ke basis pe jo bulk lead wala aapka concern hai. Aap bataye agar main aapko paanch minute mein ye number pe call back kar sakta hu main drive kar raha hu ek baar office pahunch jata hu.
Executive: Sir koi nahi aap kar lijiyega sir aap main aapko kar leti hu ya to 10 minute mein agar nahi ho to aap mujhe laga lena is number pe call theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai bolo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with leads.

- Big leads lapse before opening.

- Unable to do business with small leads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to show some things on system.

- Executive offered to call back in 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, subscription, follow up
